body: At the end of the day. this is one of the best NTR,  it really play with your anger!!
please, just keep hentai is hentai, don't bring life's shit in it !

This type of shit has been occurred in real life for numerous amount of time from all over the world. But, sadly this guy is ((The Boyfriend)) is a tool. Majority of the time in these cases people already broke up and left that slut to deal and face her own consequences.
I had to make an account just so I can comment to say how annoyed I am of that dude for one not doing anything when he found out and two for staying with after everything like WTF!
I dunno if he is strong for enduring that or weak ass for not doing anything lol

So, today I decided to ruin my day by reading this fuckin' ntr, sad guy really, still loves her after he saw that tape ? still not coming up to her room with a knife in his hand to kill that fucker that night when they are clearly having sex ? and that child in the end ? it's that a-hole guy's child with her right ? this poor guy is either too kind, or just plain dumb hahaha XD
